nhc_headline: ...CENTER OF BERYL ABOUT TO EMERGE OVER THE GULF OF MEXICO... ...HURRICANE AND STORM SURGE WATCHES IN EFFECT FOR PORTIONS OF THE  COAST OF NORTHEASTERN MEXICO AND TEXAS...
summary:
...CENTER OF BERYL ABOUT TO EMERGE OVER THE GULF OF MEXICO... ...HURRICANE AND STORM SURGE WATCHES IN EFFECT FOR PORTIONS OF THE  COAST OF NORTHEASTERN MEXICO AND TEXAS...
 As of 7:00 PM CDT Fri Jul 5
 the center of Beryl was located near 21.3, -89.7
 with movement WNW at 15 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 994 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.
